references: Related: CF 200770, CF 198775, CF 200694. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west one-half of Lots 3, 4 and 5, Block 1, University Heights Addition; Lots 10, 11 and 12, Harper's Addition; and Lot 1, Block 2, Spreutel's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-248 and 17-196, respectively.
